page.title: 05Whitley Village News
page.content: The Whitley Village News was thought up and started around{l975.}It is a small monthly booklet containing news of village matters. It is written, typed, copied and distributed by the villagers to every house. It begins with a news letter from the Editor & continues with dates for{Barn dances, {Coffee evenings, Rose Queen, Plays, etc., and a diary for the month. It also records Birthdays and provides a voice for any person or organisation to reach all the village. The front of the Village News always has a drawing made by someone from the village about activities or seasonal events. We now have an extra booklet which holds the telephone numbers of most people in the Village. The W.V.N. is completely independant, run by volunteers and financially supported by and for the people of the village.
